import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./Product.scss" const Product = () => { const [selectedImg, setSelectedImg] = useState(0); const images = [ "https://images.pexels.com/photos/10026491/pexels-photo-10026491.png?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=1260&h=750&dpr=2", "https://images.pexels.com/photos/12179283/pexels-photo-12179283.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=1260&h=750&dpr=2", ] return (
setSelectedImg[0]}/> setSelectedImg[1]}/>
) } export default Product
